FocusCheck: ^Prioritizing core gameplay UX. Any issues observed?

ActiveListening_Explanation: ^Active listening means restating concerns to ensure mutual understanding. Three components:
ConflictResolution1: ^(paraphrasing) You're worried delayed animations will push back QA cycles...

Compromise: ^Proposal: Tiered implementation. Core UI today, secondary animations in v1.1 patch.

^Agreed. I'll create the technical debt tracker.
AudioAdjustments: ^Music adjustments conflict with balance testing priorities. Numerical tuning must take precedence.
^Emotional resonance through audio is equally vital for player retention.
ABC_Application: ^Lark's B: "Emotion drives retention" vs Fox's B: "Numbers ensure fairness"

Reframe: ^Shared goal: Engagement through balanced emotional/numerical design.
^Solution: Dynamic music scaling with achievement thresholds.
Synergy: ^I can map BPM changes to XP gain rates. Technical feasible?
^Yes, using existing progression APIs. Requires 18h implementation.
^This preserves balance while adding emotional depth. Approved.
